aboutPage.title: CBStudio Radio
aboutPage.subtitle: Professional audiobook production that brings stories to life
aboutPage.missionText: We transform written stories into immersive audio experiences through professional narration, original soundtracks, and HD sound effects. Every audiobook we produce is crafted with cinematic attention to detail.
aboutPage.storyParagraph1: Founded in 2018, CBStudio Radio began with a vision to elevate audiobook production to cinematic standards. We believe every story deserves to be told with the highest quality audio production.
aboutPage.storyParagraph2: Today, we work with authors, publishers, and content creators worldwide to produce audiobooks that captivate listeners through professional narration, immersive soundscapes, and multilanguage accessibility.
aboutPage.storyParagraph3: Our commitment to excellence has made us a trusted partner in the audiobook industry, helping bring hundreds of stories to life for audiences around the globe.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How can I listen to CBStudio Radio?
faq.a1: You can listen to CBStudio Radio directly through our website or by installing our progressive web app on your mobile device. We're also available on major podcast platforms.
faq.q2: How do I submit my podcast to CBStudio Radio?
faq.a2: We're always looking for great content! Please use the contact form and select 'Partnership Opportunity' as the subject to submit your podcast for consideration.
faq.a3: Yes, our professional recording studios are available for rent. Please book an appointment to discuss your needs and schedule a tour.
faq.q4: How can I advertise on CBStudio Radio?
faq.a4: We offer various advertising options including podcast sponsorships, live broadcast ads, and digital promotions. Use our advertising form to get started.
faq.q5: Are there job opportunities at CBStudio Radio?
faq.a5: We're growing! Check our About page for current job openings or send your resume to careers@cbstudio.example.
faq.supportReady: Our support team is here to help. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
